lead_paragraph: A study comparing medications taken by normal weight, overweight and obese Americans found that obese people over 40 took more than those of average weight.
snippet: A study comparing medications taken by normal weight, overweight and obese Americans found that obese people over 40 took more than those of average weight.

headline.main: Risks: Obesity Is Found to Take Toll After Age 40
headline.print_headline: RISKS: Obesity Is Found to Take Toll After Age 40
